main.completed: What else can I help you with?
main.confused: I'm sorry, I'm not able to help with that.
main.error: Sorry, it looks like something went wrong.
main.helpText: I'm your Virtual Assistant! I can perform a number of tasks through my connected skills. Right now I can help you with Calendar, Email, Task and Point of Interest questions. Or you can help me do more by creating your own!
main.noActiveDialog: It looks like there is nothing to cancel. What can I help you with?

onboarding.haveLocation: I've added {0} as your primary location. You're all set up!
onboarding.linkedAccountsInfoBody: Switch to your companion app to get set up.
onboarding.linkedAccountsInfoTitle: I can do more if you link your accounts!
